description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，副总警监警衔。曾任中共吉林省委常委、政法委书记，吉林省公安厅厅长、党委书记，吉林省政协副主席等职。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China with the police rank of Deputy Commissioner General. He has served as a member of the Standing Committee of the CCP Jilin Provincial Committee and Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission, Director and Party Secretary of the Jilin Provincial Public Security Department, and Vice Chairman of the Jilin Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 李申学的出生地，是中华人民共和国河北省唐山市下辖的县。
description.en: Li Shenxue's birthplace, a county under the jurisdiction of Tangshan City, Hebei Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民警察警衔制度中的高级警衔之一。
description.en: One of the high-ranking police ranks in the police rank system of the People's Police of China.
